column4: I created a bootable usb drive using ubuntu 10.10 with my mac. Yet when I attempt to boot my laptop with it (after selecting the corresponding usb from boot-up) it just continues to load the OS from the hard driver after a few minutes.
Do I have to install grub or LILO on the usb drive?

There is an unresolved issue in that you cannot create a bootable USB flash drive from within Mac OS X. You must create the stick in Linux or Windows. ... https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/FromUSBStick
